Name: Ah Lung
Review Text: Situated close to the Albert Cuyp Market, in the area known as De Pijp, Ah-Lung is a Chinese-Suriname restaurant which also serves dishes from Singapore and Java, known for its spicy Indonesian cuisine. …

Name: Ah Lung
Review Text: Nice small inexpensive local restaurant.  Food was quick and delicious.  Staff are friendly and attentive.  Close to Tram station and from our hotel, Hotel Floris.  Had the wonton soup and curry chicken which was flavorful and exactly what I needed after chilly walk around the city centre.

Name: Ah Lung
Review Text: It looks a bit ugly or low quality, but the food is so well done. It comes very well spiced and with a good amount in your plate. You don't need to worry about staying hungry after eating there. And the price is good.
